mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (sname, saddr, stel, sphoto2, sopen, smenu, sprice) values (#{sname}, #{saddr}, #{stel}, #{sphoto2}, #{sopen}, #{smenu}, #{sprice} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store WHERE saddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR sname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
SELECT * FROM store WHERE saddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area1}, '%') OR saddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area2}, '%') OR saddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area3}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET sname = #{sname}, saddr = #{saddr}, stel = #{stel}, sphoto2 = #{sphoto2}, sopen = #{sopen}, smenu = #{smenu}, sprice = #{sprice} WHERE sid = #{sid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store WHERE sid > 0 ORDER BY sid LIMIT 0, 100
